sponsors.marquee: The World's First Cloud Native Processor - Now with 128 Cores!

sponsors.intro:
![](/img/ocp21glo_fnv_sponsorpagelogo-ampere.png)

### Ampere Computing is designing the future of hyperscale cloud and edge computing with the world's first cloud native processor. Built for the cloud with a modern 64-bit Arm server-based architecture, Ampere gives customers the freedom to accelerate the delivery of all cloud computing applications. With industry-leading performance, power efficiency and scalability, Ampere’s Altra® family of processors are designed to deliver on predictable performance, high scalability and power efficiency.

Through engineering and innovation, Inspur delivers cutting-edge hardware designs and solutions to address challenges across many different technology sectors.

sponsors.intro: ### Quanta Cloud Technology (QCT) is a global datacenter solution provider. We combine the efficiency of hyperscale hardware with infrastructure software from a diversity of industry leaders to solve next-generation datacenter design and operation challenges. QCT serves cloud service providers, telecoms and enterprises running public, hybrid and private clouds. Product lines include hyper-converged and software-defined datacenter solutions as well as servers, storage, switches, integrated racks with a diverse ecosystem of hardware component and software partners. QCT designs, manufactures, integrates and services cutting edge offerings via its own global network. The parent of QCT is Quanta Computer, Inc., a Fortune Global 500 corporation.

In a world where the pace of change is accelerating, more and more innovators trust Xilinx to help them get to market faster, and with optimal efficiency and performance. sponsors.marquee: ZT Systems: We Speak Hyperscale™ - the industry leading provider of purpose-built server hardware solutions from the cloud to the 5G network edge.
sponsors.name: ZT Systems
sponsors.intro: ### ZT Systems is a leading supplier of compute, storage, and accelerator solutions for hyperscale, 5G, and edge computing applications. A trusted design, manufacturing, and logistics partner with over 25 years of experience, ZT serves data center operators from enterprise organizations to the largest cloud and telecommunications providers. Headquartered in Secaucus, NJ with global manufacturing spanning the US, EMEA and APAC, ZT deploys and supports integrated rack-level solutions worldwide. Through close, confidential customer engagement, ZT leverages deep experience with hyperscale and edge computing workloads and supply chain considerations to develop application-tailored solutions. Flexible, purpose-built manufacturing capabilities enable ZT to sustain high quality while accommodating the dynamic nature of hyperscale. ZT’s commitment to operational excellence is demonstrated by a strong track record of on-time delivery.
sponsors.title: ZT Systems

sponsors.marquee: THE OPEN WORLD STARTS ON AMI. Our foundational technologies are how the world's machines Power Up, Stay On, and Run Secure.
sponsors.name: AMI
sponsors.intro: #### THE OPEN WORLD STARTS ON AMI. With AMI's opensource foundational technology, we are committed to building a community that unleashes innovation and creativity. Our solutions are how the world's machines Power Up, Stay On, and Run Secure - from on-premises to the cloud to the edge. Only AMI delivers this holistic approach to foundational technology. That's why nearly every meaningful technology company in the world relies on us. We work with multiple CPU architectures - and have been partners with silicon vendors like Intel for more than 25 years. As a result, nearly all compute platforms worldwide use firmware and software solutions from us. AMI is a key contributor to the Open Compute ecosystem and many industry associations and standards groups, such as the UEFI Forum, National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), National Cybersecurity Excellence Partnership (NCEP) and the Trusted Computing Group (TCG). For more information, visit ami.com and on Twitter @AMI_PR.
sponsors.title: AMI

sponsors.marquee: Moving Tagline - 150 Character Max	Credo Active Electrical Cables provide 28G, 56G, and 112G per lane PAM4 connectivity for distributed disaggregated chassis and NIC-to-Dual TOR racks.
sponsors.name: Credo
sponsors.intro: #### Credo is a leading provider of high-performance serial connectivity solutions for the hyperscale datacenter, 5G carrier, enterprise networking, artificial intelligence, and high-performance computing markets. Credo's solutions deliver the bandwidth, scalability, and end-to-end signal integrity for next-generation platforms requiring 25G, 50G, and 100G signal lane-rate connectivity for 100G, 200G, 400G, and 800G port enabled networks. Credo pioneered Active Electrical Cables (AECs) to solve to connectivity challenges of reach and volume facing DACs and the reliability and power hurdles of AOCs as speeds reached 400G and beyond. The cables, which integrate retimers and gearboxes in the connectors, have enabled new generations of data center architectures including distributed disaggregated chassis and NIC-to-Dual TOR implementations. Credo has 4 families of AECs in production including: SPAN AECs, CLOS AECs, SHIFT AECs, and SWITCH AECs. Learn more at https://www.credodemi.com/hiwire.
sponsors.title: Credo

videos.name: Credo HiWire AEC for DDC Application

sponsors.title: KIOXIA

sponsors.marquee: The vision of LITEON Technology is being the “Best Partner in Opto-Electronic, Eco-Friendly and Intelligent Technologies.
sponsors.name: LITEON
sponsors.intro: #### Founded in 1975, and being the first listed electronics company in Taiwan, LITEON is a world-leading provider in optoelectronic components and key electronic modules. In recent years, with its actively deployment in the fields of cloud computing, automotive electronics, 5G, AIoT, optoelectronics, etc., cultivation of smart industries, coupled with development of new business opportunities and products required for smart life and smart cities, LITEON continues to use its professionalism, rich industrial experience, high-quality products and services, and global operations bases, and become the preferred best partner of global customers for developing innovation and application of smart technology. For over four decades, LITEON produces products that are used in a broad range of applications, such as cloud computing, automotive electronics, optoelectronics, LED/lighting, smart healthcare, computers, communications, industry and consumer electronics while concentrating on establishing a competitive advantage in mass production to maximize the returns from a diverse product portfolio to realize profitable growths through resource integration and management; LITEON’s main business strategy focuses on increasing resource utilization, automation, production optimization, and streamlined processes for better productivity and efficiency; in the long-term, the focus is on realizing profitability, maintaining stable operations as well as enhancing the return of shareholders’ equity to take root in the sustainable operation of a century-old enterprise.
sponsors.title: LITEON

sponsors.marquee: With the Pliops Extreme Data Processor you can achieve: • Up to 10x Higher Performance • Up to 6x More Capacity • Up to 5x Lower Cost.
sponsors.name: Pliops
sponsors.intro: #### Today’s explosive data growth and rapidly expanding application workloads threaten to overwhelm datacenters, preventing organizations from harnessing the AI/ML, 5G, big data analytics, IoT, and other modern applications they need to achieve their business goals. The breakthrough Pliops Extreme Data Processor (XDP), delivered on an easy-to-deploy, low-profile PCIe card, overcomes storage inefficiencies to massively accelerate performance and dramatically reduce overall infrastructure costs for these data-hungry, storage-intensive applications. By radically simplifying the way data is processed and flash storage is managed, Pliops multiplies the effectiveness of organizations’ infrastructure investments by exponentially increasing datacenter performance, reliability, capacity, and efficiency.
sponsors.title: Pliops

slides.name: Pliops Solution Brief Drive Failure Protection

As the world’s third largest chipmaker with know-how and customer trust built over more than 38 years, SK hynix continues delivering on a comprehensive range of memory semiconductor solutions from DRAM and NAND Flash to CMOS image sensors. The company’s advanced memory technologies are driving critical innovations of the Fourth Industrial Revolution such as Big data, AI, Machine Learning, IoT, and Robotics. Moreover, SK hynix is aiming higher with the new “Mem4EST (Memory Forest)” initiative to quickly respond to future changes in the ICT ecosystem. With robust ESG management that accounts for value to the environment, societies, and future generations, SK hynix will continue to build competence and success around the globe.

This connectivity or use of data is built into the very fabric of our society. It is vital to human progress. Vertiv believes there is a better way to meet this accelerating demand for data — one driven by passion and innovation. As industry experts, we collaborate with our customers to envision and build future-ready infrastructures. sponsors.name: Advanced Energy
sponsors.intro: As one of the largest power supply companies in the world, Advanced Energy has many years of experience in designing and manufacturing advanced power solutions for data center, enterprise, telecom, industrial, and medical applications. We have an unmatched ability to design power conversion solutions for your specific needs. Advanced Energy's innovations for hyperscale and cloud computing data centers focus on optimizing efficiency and power density to reduce the total cost of ownership. Contact your Advanced Energy sales representative to learn how you can reduce operating costs for your data center. Our dedicated research and development and operations teams ensure swift deployment and stable operations for your program needs.
sponsors.title: Advanced Energy

sponsors.marquee: Amphenol provides a wide range of the most advanced interconnect solutions for modern Data Centers and all their components.
sponsors.name: Amphenol
sponsors.intro: Amphenol ICC, a division of Amphenol Corporation, is a world leader in interconnect solutions for the Information, Communications and Commercial electronics markets. Amphenol Corporation is one of the world’s largest designers and manufacturers of electrical, electronic and fiber optic connectors and interconnect systems, antennas, sensors and sensor-based products and coaxial and high-speed specialty cable. Amphenol ICC has an expansive global presence in research and development, manufacturing, and sales. We design and manufacture a wide range of innovative connectors as well as cable assemblies and optical transceivers for diverse applications including server, storage, data center, networking, industrial, business equipment and automotive.
sponsors.title: AMPHENOL

sponsors.marquee: Arm Neoverse Powers Cloud to Edge Infrastructure Solutions for a World of a 1T Devices. Learn more @https://www.arm.com/solutions/infrastructure.
sponsors.name: Arm
sponsors.intro: #### Arm technology is at the heart of a computing and data revolution that is transforming the way people live and businesses operate. Our energy-efficient processor designs and software platforms have enabled advanced computing in more than 190 billion chips and our technologies securely power products from sensors to supercomputers. Arm Neoverse IP is powering cloud to edge infrastructure solutions. These include silicon from Ampere Computing (Altra/Altra Max), Amazon (AWS Graviton2), Marvell (ThunderX2, OCTEON 10), NVIDIA (BlueField), Intel (Mt. Evans), NXP (Layerscape) and others. These products power cloud & edge services from AWS, Microsoft, Oracle, FaceBook Connectivity, Cloudflare, Alibaba, Tencent, ByteDance, Equinix and others. Within the OCP community Arm is a contributor to open-source firmware projects including Tianocore/EDK2, LinuxBoot, OpenBMC, and OpenOCD. Arm’s contributions can be seen in Ampere Computing’s “Mt. Jade” reference platform, available from Wiwynn.
sponsors.title: Arm

sponsors.marquee: As a global leader in interconnect solutions, BizLink is committed to enabling reliable interconnection in a digital world. This year we are excited to showcase our high-speed interconnect, power and optics solutions for data centers including DAC, HiWire™ Active Electrical Cables (AEC), AOC, optical transceivers, high-density optical tray and cassette, and high power solutions at the OCP Global Summit.
sponsors.name: BizLink Technology, Inc.
sponsors.intro: BizLink, founded in 1996, is headquartered in Silicon Valley, USA. Our mission is to make interconnection easier and to become the leading global interconnect solution supplier. We support industries that are environmentally conscious and improve quality of life through providing essential components, wire harnesses, and cables to a wide variety of industries such as IT and CE, Motor Vehicle, Electrical Appliances, Medical Equipment, Industrial, Optical Fiber Communications, and Solar. Our vertically integrated business model includes manufacturing sites in the United States, Mexico, Slovakia, Serbia, China, Malaysia, and Singapore. BizLink incorporates state-of-the-art facilities, advanced manufacturing processes, and professional research and development capabilities. Our global R&D and service teams in America, Europe, and Asia strive to keep collaborating closely with customers to turn their innovative ideas into reality.
sponsors.title: BizLink Technology, Inc.

Edgecore Networks is the leader in open networking, providing a full line of open 1G-400G Ethernet OCP Accepted™ switches, core routers, cell site gateways, virtual PON OLTs, packet transponders, and Wi-Fi access points that offer choice of commercial and open source NOS and SDN software.

sponsors.marquee: Modernize your testing with a shift-left approach. Ixia test solutions help you validate early in every phase.
sponsors.name: Keysight Technologies
sponsors.intro: #### Keysight delivers advanced design and validation solutions to help accelerate innovation to connect and secure the world. Our Ixia network and security test solutions bring tomorrow’s technology products to market faster across the development lifecycle, in design simulation, prototype validation, automated software testing, and network performance optimization, and visibility in chipset and chipset and device manufacturing, enterprise, service provider, and cloud environments. We offer a powerful combination of innovative solutions and trusted insight to move testing ‘further to the left’. Testing earlier and more often ensures faster time to market with high-quality end products. Join the world’s leading innovators that already rely on Keysight to validate their network and security products, from concept to operation.
sponsors.title: Keysight Technologies

Founded twenty years ago by the team that created the original beowulf cluster, Penguin Computing has been integral to the development of modern HPC and data center technologies. Today, Penguin Computing focuses on four key areas, High-performance Computing, Artificial Intelligence, Software-defined Storage, and Cloud Computing solutions.

sponsors.marquee: Building Real Open Networks With White Box and SONiC Integrated Solutions. Open Networking With Vision and Precision.
sponsors.name: Ragile Networks, Inc.
sponsors.intro: #### Ragile Networks Inc. specializes in providing products and solutions for data center networks. Its name “Ragile” consists of two parts: the letter “R” refers to the first letter of “rapid”, while the second part is the word “agile”. This represents the company's commitment to providing customers with “fast, agile and open” products and services. With a number of R&D and manufacturing centers around the world, and industry-leading professional R&D and testing teams, Ragile has a deep understanding and rich experience in the R&D of technologies such as NOS, ASIC and SDK. With a precise understanding of customer needs in the data center scenario and a strong technological innovation capability, Ragile aims to provide the industry's most complete portfolio of data center network products and solutions for its global customers, including a full series of 25/50/100/200/400GbE-based bare metal data center switches. On top of that, Ragile dedicates itself to ensuring delivery and providing professional services for Hyperscale data center networks. Looking to the future, Ragile will bring more open, agile network experiences to each organization and individual, helping users achieve digital transformation and giving them an edge in the market.
sponsors.title: Ragile Networks, Inc.

slides.name: Ragile Networks for OCP Virtual Booth

sponsors.intro: Samtec is exhibiting in-person at the Global Summit in San Jose, CA. You can find us at booth A22 or reach us through the "contact us" button above.
sponsors.title: Samtec

sponsors.marquee: Multiply your Compute, Storage, and Network Efficiency with ScaleFlux Storage Products.
sponsors.name: ScaleFlux
sponsors.intro: ##### ScaleFlux storage products are designed to help our customers overcome the challenges of the data-centric economy to multiply the value of their compute, storage, and networking infrastructure. ScaleFlux customers have reported up to 3x performance per node, 4x storage per dollar, 9x endurance per TB, and 15x lower latency per query in comparison to using ordinary SSDs – all with zero code changes to their applications. The overarching result – improved efficiency. With the recently announced 3000 family, ScaleFlux will enable users to further expand these efficiency benefits for even more use cases across enterprise, data center, and edge deployments. The 3000 family, based on ScaleFlux’s SFX 3000 storage processor, includes NVMe Solid State Drives (SSDs), NVMe Computational Storage Drives (CSDs), NVMe Computational Storage Processors (CSPs), and software tuned to fully utilize the capabilities of computational storage (CSware).
sponsors.title: ScaleFlux

sponsors.marquee: Innovation in Enterprise Flash Storage.
sponsors.name: Silicon Motion
sponsors.intro: ###### Silicon Motion Technology Corporation (NasdaqGS: SIMO) is the global leader in developing NAND ﬂash controllers for SSDs and other solid state storage devices. We have over 20 years of experience developing specialized processor ICs that manage NAND components and deliver market leading, high-performance storage solutions widely used in smartphones, PCs, data centers and commercial and industrial applications. We have one of the broadest portfolios of controller intellectual properties developed from our deep understanding of NAND characteristics, which enables us to design both unique, highly optimized configurable ICs plus related firmware controller platforms and complete turnkey controller solutions. With comprehensive knowledge of NAND characteristics, flexible ASIC/Firmware design capabilities and proprietary NANDXtend™ ECC technology which integrates error recovery functionality with a machine learning algorithms, SMI’s enterprise storage solutions deliver high performance, extended data retention and improved QoS. Additional information on Silicon Motion’s innovative and comprehensive Enterprise / Data Center product portfolio is available by clicking the link in the sidebar.

sponsors.marquee: DriveNets builds networks like cloud, over a fully virtualized cloud-native architecture - scalable, demand-responsive and innovations-ready.
sponsors.name: DriveNets
sponsors.intro: #### DriveNets is a leader in cloud-native networking software and network disaggregation solutions. Founded in 2015 and based in Israel, DriveNets offers communications service providers (CSPs) and cloud providers a radical new way to build networks, substantially growing their profitability by changing their technological and economic models. DriveNets’ solution – Network Cloud – adapts the architectural model of cloud to telco-grade networking. Network Cloud is a cloud-native software that runs over a shared physical infrastructure of standard white-boxes, radically simplifying the network’s operations, offering telco-scale performance and elasticity at a much lower cost.
sponsors.title: DriveNets

slides.name: White Paper Introducing Network Cloud Jul 2021

sponsors.marquee: Single Phase Immersion Cooling Fluids: Designed with the Data Center Industry in mind.
sponsors.name: FUCHS LUBRICANTS CO.
sponsors.intro:
#### FUCHS is a global leader in the development and production of comprehensive lubricant solutions, products, and services. Our RENOLIN Fluids for Electronic Component Cooling (FECC) were designed with the needs of the data center in mind. Switching to our single-phase immersion cooling can help your plant increase power rack density, reduce energy usage, reduce CO2 emissions and cut operational costs.

#### The RENOLIN FECC product line includes both mineral oils and synthetic fluids. Our products are safe, reliable and offer:

* #### Excellent dielectric properties
* #### Great heat conductivity
* #### Protection against corrosion
* #### Compatibility with common IT materials 

#### FUCHS provides customers with efficient, sustainable, and innovative solutions driven by our global distribution network, CO2-neutral production, and cutting-edge technology. Our commitment to research and development enables us to provide solutions for the ever-changing needs of the data center industry.
sponsors.title: FUCHS LUBRICANTS CO.

sponsors.name: MiTAC Computing Technology Corporation
sponsors.intro: #### Focused on cloud computing solutions and services, MiTAC Computing Technology boasts more than 20 years of design and manufacturing experience in hyperscale datacenters, enterprise servers, storage systems, embedded products and industrial computers. Combined with TYAN's 30 year history of server customization capacity and comprehensive relationships in the channel with system integration partners, it is now providing customers with products which feature flexibility and customization across many different system and application types. MiTAC’s cloud computing solutions cover the entire spectrum, from rack and tower systems, high-performance and GPU-accelerated computing, cloud computing servers, storage systems, blade servers, workstations, through to complete systems and cabinets. These products are aimed at offering customers the best TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) for the next generation of public, private and hybrid cloud equipment; MiTAC smart client solutions may contain panel PC, BOX PC, mobile POS, and industrial mainboards to offer brand owners and system integrators with specialty solutions featuring better integration and competitive design.
sponsors.title: MiTAC Computing Technology Corporation.

sponsors.marquee: Pluribus Adaptive Cloud Fabric delivers powerful networking solutions that are extremely simple to deploy and operate. It’s Cloud Networking–simplified.
sponsors.name: Pluribus Networks
sponsors.intro: #### Pluribus delivers data center network switching and monitoring fabrics that radically simplify operations and lower costs. Built on a foundation of open networking, our unique controllerless software-defined networking (SDN) architecture incorporates network automation, virtualization, segmentation, visibility and analytics in a comprehensive, cost-effective and easy-to-use solution that works right out of the box. Whether modernizing a leaf-spine network in a single software-defined data center, deploying data center interconnect to create a unified network fabric across a multi-site data center, building a distributed cloud in edge computing environments, automating your lab environment or intelligently steering traffic to monitoring tools, Pluribus Adaptive Cloud Fabric™ delivers powerful solutions that are extremely simple to deploy and operate. Pluribus is deployed by more than 350 customers, including more than 100 tier one mobile network operators around the globe.
sponsors.title: Pluribus Networks

Submer is the perfect partner for enterprises and datacenters wishing to implement solutions that help their datacenters make sense. sponsors.marquee: FADU is leading the industry with the lowest power, highest sustainable QoS Enterprise Storage Solutions for Gen 4 and beyond. Visit www.fadutec.com.
sponsors.name: FADU Technology
sponsors.intro: FADU is a fabless start up focusing on advancing Flash storage technology. We are dedicated to developing and deploying a new architecture for SSD controllers and storage products that meets the explosively increasing diverse data demands placed on enterprise datacenters. We believe that existing solutions, with their legacy ties to the past, are unable to meet both performance and power requirements to support real-time, cloud based, connected applications. FADU’s global team, comprised of seasoned storage architects, ASIC experts and SSD engineers, is charting the course for the industry. We are addressing all aspects of the Flash-based enterprise storage solution – very lower power, ultra-high performance, rich feature set, solid reliability and a superior QOS. FADU is shipping PCIe Gen 3 and PCIe Gen 4 SSDs with PCIe Gen 5 being readied for market adoption in 2022. FADU is a member of the Open Compute Project.

In 2019, Circle B joined Taurus Group, a leading IT hardware distribution company based in The Netherlands. With established distribution channels across Europe, Taurus was the ideal partner to help Circle B fulfill its vision of making OCP hardware widely available to the European market. sponsors.marquee: Welcome from OpenCAPI. Visit our booth and opencapi.org to learn how OpenCAPI and OMI can help you build faster and more efficient memory systems.
sponsors.name: OpenCAPI Consortium
sponsors.intro: #### OpenCAPI Consortium The purpose of the OpenCAPI Consortium is to create an open coherent high performance bus interface based on a new bus standard called Open Coherent Accelerator Processor Interface (OpenCAPI) and develop the ecosystem that utilizes this interface. This initiative is being driven by the emerging accelerated computing and advanced memory/storage solutions that have introduced significant system bottlenecks in today’s current open bus protocols and requires a technical solution that is openly available. The member collaboration define an open bus protocol standard that starts from the microprocessor interface on up to any accelerators, memory/storage solutions, bridge chips that enable further interaction with additional protocols, and potentially others. These open bus protocol standards have been made available publicly at the consortium website.
sponsors.title: OpenCAPI Consortium

videos.name: ICS Workshop - Decoupling Compute from Memory, Storage & IO with OMI - Master

sponsors.marquee: The SDIA is the leading platform for driving sustainability in the digital sector.
sponsors.name: Sustainable Digital Infrastructure Alliance (SDIA)
sponsors.intro: #### Established in 2019 and co-based in Germany and the Netherlands, the Sustainable Digital Infrastructure Alliance e.V. (SDIA) is a nonprofit network that aims to drive collaboration across industries to enable a thriving digital ecosystem without negative impacts on the environment through competitive and sustainable digital infrastructure. With its network of more than 65 members and partners, SDIA works to make the infrastructure powering the digital economy sustainable, while ensuring it remains open and accessible to everyone. Its Roadmap to Sustainable Digital Infrastructure by 2030 is the primary mechanism that enables all stakeholders from across the value chain to connect, benchmark, and deliver sustainability. It is meant to offer a holistic, systems-thinking approach to solving the challenges facing ICT sustainability, ranging from energy supply and data centers to fiber-optic networks and software.
sponsors.title: Sustainable Digital Infrastructure Alliance (SDIA)

Over 185 companies and 2,500 member volunteers collaborate on open source and standards in the technology areas of next generation storage management, computational storage, persistent memory, solid state drives, connectors, transceivers, form factors, and more. Visit us at www.snia.org.

**WE SPEAK EVENTS: In-person, virtual, and everything in-between.**\
Over the past 20+ years, we’ve successfully partnered with top-tier companies like Apple, Facebook, Open Compute Project, Wells Fargo, Vans, and Volcom on events of all sizes, types and budgets. Domestic and abroad. Intimate and straightforward to extremely complex and expansive. We have two large headquarters—one in the Northern California Bay Area and another in Southern California, which includes a virtual reality lab, 3D printing hub, and robust wood/metal fabrication shop. We’re a people-first company, which to us means treating every employee, client, vendor, partner, and community member with honesty, integrity, and respect. It’s part of our corporate ethos. People power our mission and we are eternally grateful to know and work with some of the best in the business. And as always, we make sure to have a lot of fun along the way. For more FNinfo, visit us at [fntech.com](http://fntech.com/).

sponsors.marquee: The OCP Experience Center provide a new ways for OCP members to showcase best-in-class product demos, solution stacks, software and hardware, both live and static.
sponsors.name: Experience Center (MAIN)
sponsors.intro:
The Experience Center at the OCP Global Summit is a dedicated space for the Community to showcase their hardware designs, architecture and software solutions on OCP-recognized hardware platforms. The OCP Experience Center was established in 2019 to provide new ways for OCP members to showcase best-in-class product demos, both live and static. The initiative was launched at the OCP Global and Regional (European) Summits last year, and they were among the most popular attractions. Not only do the partners get a chance to showcase their OCP Accepted™ and OCP Inspired™ product offerings, they also get a chance to receive feedback from Summit attendees. The OCP Experience Center offers Summit attendees a chance to explore products and their piece-parts, and see through the software solutions that have been built primarily for the platforms being demonstrated.

**To explore all each Experience Center's content, in the right column, click the center you want to learn more about!**

**[Open System Firmware](/a/sponsor/86-open-system-firmware)**

**[Hardware Management Center](/a/sponsor/85-hardware-management)**

**[Tap Center ](/a/sponsor/87-tap)**

**[Networking Center ](/a/sponsor/89-networking)** 

**[Telco Center](/a/sponsor/90-telco)**

**[Server Center ](/a/sponsor/91-server)**

**[OAI Center](/a/sponsor/92-oai)**

**[Test and Validation Center ](/a/sponsor/93-test-and-validation)**

**[Storage Experience Center](/a/sponsor/94-storage)**
sponsors.title: Experience Center

sponsors.marquee: Credo, DriveNets &UfiSpace are demonstrating the world’s largest distributed disaggregated chassis implementation – a 350Tb Jericho2c+ 3-rack cluster.
sponsors.name: Networking
sponsors.intro: DDCs have become core to Hyperscale Data Center and Telco design, enabling commodity white box hardware to be mated with open source or 3rd party software to build a flexible, scalable solution without the high cost and proprietary lockin of a chassis. Credo, DreiveNets, and UfiSpace came together at OCP 2020 to demonstrate the world’s first working DDC implementation – a 96Tb Jericho design. For OCP 2021, the trio of DDC-enablers has implemented the world’s largest DDC implementation, a 3-rack 350Tb Jercicho2c+ cluster, again using software from DriveNets, hardware from UfiSpace, and AEC cables from Credo. The new implementation shows the scalability and low power management of the architecture. Information on the 350Tb implementation can be found at https://www.credosemi.com/hiwire-350tb-ddc.
sponsors.title: Explore more about Networking Station

slides.name: Credo HiWire DDC Solution Brief 345Tb Jerico2C+Ramon
